评论详情: I'm 5'7 with long legs and have always had the hardest time finding pants that are actually long enough. These sit comfortably below my ankles and don't ride up when I sit down. They are a good value for money. The sizing is accurate.

The denim blue color I love.  They look great on.  They are not leggings that I would wear to work out in. I prefer tighter ones for that. These are my more fashionable joggers for travel or running around town. Casual hanging out etc.  Pair  with denim jacket and white tee  and some walking sneakers.  Cute!
These fit fantastically and are nice to wear to the gym but also nice to wear out. The material is nice.

These are the best pants. I work from home and absolutely love wearing these. I also wear them to travel in. They are the best ever.

These are soft, thin but not see through. Length is good. I got the medium, I am 5’7” 150 pounds.

These were exactly what I was expecting. Great length, soft stretchy material. The waist sits above the hips but below the belly button. The color is beautiful. I love these leggings. I just bought my third pair. They fit perfectly. So comfortable and love the pockets.

Great joggers, true to size . Colors are vibrant and they are very lightweight . Will continuevto purchase this brand.
Durable  soft fits good

I’ve been looking for a pair of flattering joggers since I’m kind of tired of the leggings look. I was originally looking for some with jersey material when I came across these. I would describe them as a cross between joggers and leggings and they are fantastic! The material is similar to leggings - stretchy and silky. Like the kind of material dog/cat hair doesn’t stick to (this is super important to me because we have four dogs and three cats). They have slight compression through the lower belly which is great since I’ve had 2 kids. They are PERFECT for going to kids sport events or the gym. They feel super durable, not see through at all despite the leggings-like fabric, and perfect weight material for any season (at least in Texas). For fit reference, I’m about 10 pounds heavier than I usually am right now and I’m fairly bottom-heavy. Right now, I wear medium in leggings, 10-12 in jeans, and medium T-shirts. Since these are joggers, I wanted a looser fit so I got a Large… as you can see by the pics they are NOT loose. I would definitely say they are more snug than expected but I actually love them. I rarely go by the size charts since my measurements always put me in between sizes, but in this case, I think the size chart would probably have been pretty accurate and with my current weight & measurements, and XL would have given me the fit I thought I was looking for. But once I lose this extra 10-15 pounds from the holidays they’ll be perfect. I’m 5’5”, 180 pounds. Measurements are bust: 40” (36 DD), waist 33”, hips 45”.

Received a pair for Christmas and I LOVE THEM! They’re not typical sweatpant joggers - the material is more akin to the smooth Lycra feel you get with athletic leggings but without the cling and compression. The pockets are deep enough to hold your phone and small ID wallet and keys without worrying about anything falling out. I will definitely be buying more of these pants and this brand in the future

I am 5’6”, 140 lbs and ordered a medium. These are ok but far from my favorite jogger. They are made more short and wide, so they are rather unflattering.
